contents.text: Thank you for calling AKQA San Francisco, where through the imaginative application of art and science we create a better future with you.
For information on our marketing and creative services, press 1.
For creative campaign development and design, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to one of our creative specialists.

navigationGoals: Connect with a creative specialist to outline a new campaign concept and get cost and timeline estimates
I need help designing a creative campaign for my veterans’ nonprofit organization.
Discuss concept art pipeline and branding deliverables for an upcoming campaign.
I need to speak with someone about creating a print ad design for my local community event.
Discuss designing a visual campaign for my university physics outreach events.

contents.text: For digital strategy and user experience solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our digital strategy team.

navigationGoals: Speak with the digital strategy team about improving our website’s user experience and request a proposal
I’d like to discuss digital strategy and UX solutions for a website that connects veterans with support services.
Inquire about integrating user journey mapping and A/B testing frameworks into our digital strategy.
I want to talk to an expert about improving my small business website’s user experience.
Get advice on improving the user experience of a physics educational app I’m developing.

contents.text: For career opportunities and general inquiries, press 2.
To learn about current job openings, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our recruitment team.

navigationGoals: Inquire about current senior UX designer openings and clarify the application process
I’m a veteran looking to learn about current job openings and AKQA’s veteran hiring initiatives.
Get details on available software engineering positions and their technical requirements.
I’m interested in hearing about current job openings in graphic design at your company.
Inquire about internship openings at AKQA for physics majors.

contents.text: For general questions about AKQA and our services, press 2.
Please hold while we route your call to our information desk.

navigationGoals: Obtain a concise overview of AKQA’s services and capabilities to assess potential collaboration
I have general questions about how AKQA supports veterans through partnerships and community programs.
Request an overview of AKQA’s full-service capabilities, including API integrations and data analytics.
I have general questions about your agency’s services and how you work with clients.
Ask for general information about AKQA’s services and their work with science and education clients.
